## Features

- An **unofficial** Quarto theme extension for Stanford University. 
  - `html`: An HTML-themed Stanford webpage.
  - `beamer`: A Beamer-themed Stanford slide deck based on [Sanha Cheong's Beamer Theme](https://github.com/sanhacheong/stanford-beamer-presentation).
